meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>reach</kanji> and the verb version is <vocabulary>to reach</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to amount to</vocabulary> . This is like "x reached y" or "x amounted to y."
readingMnemonic: <reading>Oh, yo</reading>, if you want to reach that number, you'll have to try harder.
